div.p:
Not having heard anything
more respecting the intended Publication I am not
aware whether the design has been standard, or
whether its accomplishment may be so far advanced
as to render this annex'd too late for insertion.
If in time, and worth using, they are heartily
at thy service. Sorry only, if it could have lent
one somewhat worthier of the acceptance, but if
they serve to show that I wish, well to
the effort, the object thy have in view
and end is answered.

In the spirit of the
annex'd trifle I have endeavor'd briefly,
to express some of those better feelings which
I conceive constitute the common character of true Christians & Saints
of whatever name or profession in the unfortunate Slaves, Mother, in reference to
her equally unfortunate Child. But as all believe in Slaves
now, would they were more frequent & in which Humanity,
the latter of Humanities be the consolation of the oppressed
& are forced to Suffer injury & Death Being, I have en-
deavour'd in the second short trifle to embody some of
those humble feelings of a Negro Mother still. I did without
the consciousness consciousness of the painful. Surely the sentiment contained
in the concluding Verse must reach to such as one. For in
my own apprehension as is the Company of Humanity, Sympathy
& the Glory of the Endeavour, the Welfare & the Lot which
he is the highest Victim, implies a Sanction not more dreadful.
